book.instructions1: If this book does not have an ISBN, you must generate a custom "BibelLib-ISBN" here.
book.instructions2:
To quickly scan books without official ISBN
you should print a lable with the BibleLib-ISBN and attach it to the back of the book.
book.instructions3:
Should additional copies of this book be created?
Provide the amount and save this book. If the saving of the book works, the copies will be created.
